verses.text: \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \add was\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. His \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* also \add was\add* \w Zibiah|strong="H6645"\w* of \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*.

And \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

And \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* for him \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*; and he \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass \w after|strong="H0310"\w* this, \add that\add* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* was \w minded|strong="H3820"\w* to \w repair|strong="H2318"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 24.4 \ft to repair: Heb. to renew\f*

And he gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to them, Go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* to \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w from|strong="H1767"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* to \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and see that ye \w hasten|strong="H4116"\w* the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*. Howbeit the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w hastened|strong="H4116"\w* \add it\add* not.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Why hast thou not \w required|strong="H1875"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* to bring \w in|strong="H0935"\w* out of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and out of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* the \w collection|strong="H4864"\w*, \add according to the commandment\add* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, for the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of \w witness|strong="H5715"\w*?

For the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*, that \w wicked|strong="H4849"\w* woman, had broken \w up|strong="H6555"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and also all the dedicated \w things|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* did they \w bestow|strong="H6213"\w* upon \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*.

And at the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H0559"\w* they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w chest|strong="H0727"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5414"\w* it \w without|strong="H2351"\w* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they \w made|strong="H5414"\w* a \w proclamation|strong="H6963"\w* through \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to bring \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w collection|strong="H4864"\w* \add that\add* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add laid\add* upon \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.\f + \fr 24.9 \ft a proclamation: Heb. a voice\f*

And all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*, and brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* into the \w chest|strong="H0727"\w*, until they had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w*.

Now it came to pass, that at what \w time|strong="H6256"\w* the \w chest|strong="H0727"\w* was \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w office|strong="H6486"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \add there was\add* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* and the \w high|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w officer|strong="H6496"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w emptied|strong="H6168"\w* the \w chest|strong="H0727"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* it, and \w carried|strong="H7725"\w* it to his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*. Thus they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* by \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it to such as \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w masons|strong="H2672"\w* and \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w* to \w repair|strong="H2318"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and also such as \w wrought|strong="H2796"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* and \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* to \w mend|strong="H2388"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

So the \w workmen|strong="H4399"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w*, and the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w was|strong="H5927"\w* \w perfected|strong="H0724"\w* by \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, and they \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in his \w state|strong="H4971"\w*, and \w strengthened|strong="H0553"\w* it.\f + \fr 24.13 \ft the work…: Heb. the healing went up upon the work\f*

And when they had \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \add it\add*, they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, whereof were \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8335"\w*, and to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \add withal\add*, and \w spoons|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*. And they \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*.  +  r 24.14  t to offer…: or, pestils *

¶ But \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* waxed \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, and was \w full|strong="H7646"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w* when he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \add was he\add* when he \w died|strong="H4194"\w*.

And they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* among the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, because he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, both toward \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and toward his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

Now \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and made \w obeisance|strong="H7812"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto them.

And they \w left|strong="H5800"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* and \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*: and \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* came upon \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* for this their \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w*.

Yet he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* to them, to bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* against them: but they would not give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*.

And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H3847"\w* upon \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, which \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* above the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, Why \w transgress|strong="H5674"\w* ye the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that ye cannot \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*? because ye have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, he hath also \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* you.  +  r 24.20  t came…: Heb. clothed *

And they \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against him, and \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* at the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* not the \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* which \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to him, but \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. And when he \w died|strong="H4194"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon \add it\add*, and \w require|strong="H1875"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H8622"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \add that\add* the \w host|strong="H2428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against him: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* all the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of them unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*.\f + \fr 24.23 \ft at the…: Heb. in the revolution of the year\f*\f + \fr 24.23 \ft Damascus: Heb. Darmesek\f*

For the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with a \w small|strong="H4705"\w* company of \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* \w host|strong="H2428"\w* into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, because they had \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*. So they \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H8201"\w* against \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*.

And when they were \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* from him, (for they \w left|strong="H5800"\w* him in \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w diseases|strong="H4251"\w*,) his own \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against him for the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* him on his \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, but they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him not in the \w sepulchres|strong="H6913"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

And these are they that \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against him; \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimeath|strong="H8100"\w* an \w Ammonitess|strong="H5985"\w*, and \w Jehozabad|strong="H3075"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimrith|strong="H8116"\w* a \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*.\f + \fr 24.26 \ft Zabad: or, Jozacher\f*\f + \fr 24.26 \ft Shimrith: or, Shomer\f*

¶ Now \add concerning\add* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and the \w greatness|strong="H7235"\w* of the \w burdens|strong="H4853"\w* \add laid\add* upon him, and the \w repairing|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w story|strong="H4097"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*. And \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 24.27 \ft repairing: Heb. founding\f*\f + \fr 24.27 \ft story: or, commentary\f*
